body:
Is there any specific time or duration for an Avicus mod to do the task required?
If yes, how long?
:)
body_tagged:
Is there any specific time or duration for an Avicus mod to do the task required?
If yes, how long?
:)
title: Question on the moderating time on Avicus

replies.body:
You need to be more specific.
There is no time limit for moderating or for issuing a punishment although quicker is better.

Can you be more specific though? What do you mean exactly?
replies.body_tagged:
You need to be more specific.
There is no time limit for moderating or for issuing a punishment although quicker is better.

Can you be more specific though? What do you mean exactly?

replies.body:
Should a mod be at least on the server once a day?
At least how long should a mod be on the Avicus?
replies.body_tagged:
Should a mod be at least on the server once a day?
At least how long should a mod be on the Avicus?

replies.body:
I think staff should be on every day.
They should be on for at lest an hour.
replies.body_tagged:
I think staff should be on every day.
They should be on for at lest an hour.

reply_to.body:
Should a mod be at least on the server once a day?
At least how long should a mod be on the Avicus?
reply_to.body_tagged:
Should a mod be at least on the server once a day?
At least how long should a mod be on the Avicus?

replies.body: I think they should be fairly active. Of course if theres an exam coming up they won't be on as much but I'd say on average 1-2 hours per day wouldn't be bad. And if you have dual-monitors you can do other stuff while moderating so it doesn't take that much of a hit on you if you want to watch a movie or something.
replies.body_tagged: I think they should be fairly active. Of course if theres an exam coming up they won't be on as much but I'd say on average 1-2 hours per day wouldn't be bad. And if you have dual-monitors you can do other stuff while moderating so it doesn't take that much of a hit on you if you want to watch a movie or something.

replies.body:
Regarding your question, there is no minimal amout of time that a moderator needs to be on the servers.

Although being more active is more benefical, moderators don't need to be on at any given time.
replies.body_tagged:
Regarding your question, there is no minimal amout of time that a moderator needs to be on the servers.

Although being more active is more benefical, moderators don't need to be on at any given time.

replies.body: Staff are expected to be reasonably active, but it's not as if you have to moderate every single day of the year.
replies.body_tagged: Staff are expected to be reasonably active, but it's not as if you have to moderate every single day of the year.

replies.body: We were talking about this actually in the Interview chat and Jozz says once you are not on like one day a week or something like that its fine.
replies.body_tagged: We were talking about this actually in the Interview chat and Jozz says once you are not on like one day a week or something like that its fine.
